thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 18 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Steel Dynamics Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.96

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Steel Dynamics Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.96
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Steel Dynamics Inc:
* Q1 SALES $2.6 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.58 BILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.91 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* INCREASES Q1 CASH DIVIDEND BY 21 PERCENT * STEEL DYNAMICS - REMAIN “CONFIDENT” THAT CURRENT & ANTICIPATED MACROECONOMIC & MARKET CONDITIONS ARE IN PLACE TO BENEFIT DOMESTIC STEEL CONSUMPTION IN 2018
* Q1 2018 AVERAGE PRODUCT SELLING PRICE FOR COMPANY’S STEEL OPERATIONS INCREASED $61 TO $822 PER TON
* STEEL DYNAMICS - STEEL PRODUCTION UTILIZATION RATE WAS 94 PERCENT IN Q1 2018, COMPARED TO ESTIMATED DOMESTIC STEEL INDUSTRY UTILIZATION RATE OF 76 PERCENT
* “BELIEVE RECENT U.S. FEDERAL ADMINISTRATION STEEL TRADE ACTIONS WILL RESULT IN REDUCED IMPORTS DURING THE YEAR” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
